ZentroAPI Gateway Documentation

A high-performance, lightweight API Gateway built with Go and React.

Getting Started
Management UI
API Reference

High Performance

Built with Go 1.24 and Chi router for minimal latency and high throughput.

Dynamic Routing

Configure routes via JSON without restarting the server. Hot-reloading supported.

Modern Dashboard

Manage and monitor your gateway with a sleek React 19 & Tailwind CSS 4 UI.
